page.title: 20The Parish Council
page.content: Nine members make up the Parish Council under the chairmanship of Mrs. Atterbury who has been a councillor for 39 years. The Lighting Committee has been looking at the street lighting and at their recommendation the Council has brought the total of lights to 41, this over the past few years. The Council decided that the battle against damp and must was being lost so the contents of the Parish Chest have been transferred to the County Record Office in Northampton. Last year we decided to put new life into the Tidy Village Competition by presenting our own prizes for the prettiest hanging basket and window box. This was so successful that we have extended it to small tubs this year and hope for an even bigger entry than the 25 to 30 we had in 1984.
